text: وَلَقَد تَّرَكْنَا مِنْهَآ ءَايَةًۢ بَيِّنَةً لِّقَوْمٍ يَعْقِلُونَ

translation.en.sahih: And We have certainly left of it a sign as clear evidence for a people who use reason.
translation.id.indonesian: Dan sesungguhnya Kami tinggalkan daripadanya satu tanda yang nyata bagi orang-orang yang berakal.
